### Install

```shell
npm i @website/coffeekraken-io
```

# z-index

To avoid headaches, here's some z-index where you can find our UI elements:

-   `50`: Tooltips
-   `100`: Backdrop
-   `200`: Floating UI like datetime picker, color picker, etc...
